item.title: Rune-Devotion 667/704
item.dc:creator: @zeshan_2005 zeshan 2005
item.description:
@zeshan_2005 wrote:

This server is totally amazing, astonishing, everything works just like Runescape.

EXP Rates are perfect for PKers.
Skilling Rates are perfect for Skilling.
Money-making is reasonable.
Amazing developers/Coders.
A extremely caring Owner.
Staff team is well organised and managed.

I’d give this server a 9.5/10. It’s truly amazing and will go far.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Devotion 667/704
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

This server is actually not bad. It’s still in development and does have some bugs. Putting that aside it’s a good server. I don’t see many mods on. As Soulcist said, when I got on some of the mods are a tinsie bit rude. James, the owner, is a great helpful guide. The server is updated a lot and every time many bugs are fixed. The players they’re not bad. They’re just average Runescape players.

I give the server a eight out of 10.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Devotion 667/704
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Review:

The server itself seems alright, it was released just yesterday and so a lot of things need to be added and fixed, with time it’ll all be done, the owner is doing alright for being the ONLY developer as far as I’m aware.

The staff team seem intelligent enough, some of them are ignorant and needs to be talked to, I would demote them on sight if I could but eh… I’ll manage. As far as how they act, MANY of them act decent and active (through the time I was online). James the owner is wonderful, answers questions, active, helpful etc., and CERTAINLY not a moron like most owners are/would be. The staff team need to learn to deal with people not following the rules, multiple incidents have happened and not a single thing was done about it.

The community itself are decent bunch, some of them are idiots and need to learn how to cope with others, some members ‘flame’ each other out of nowhere as far as I’ve seen, nothing was done to them (with staff members being there) but other than that, it’s fine.

I’ll give the entire thing about a 8.5/10.

Read full topic
